Name: Mirai Fury LX
Description:
Manufacturer: Mirai
Focus: Racing

Featuring best-in-class maneuverability and fully integrated, cutting-edge Xi’an tech, the next-generation Fury LX racing ship from Mirai switches out the lithe ship’s offensive capabilities to make room for additional maneuvering thrusters perfect for getting across the finish line.
DescriptionText: Featuring best-in-class maneuverability and fully integrated, cutting-edge Xi'an tech, the next-generation Fury LX racing ship from Mirai switches out the lithe ship's offensive capabilities to make room for additional maneuvering thrusters perfect for getting across the finish line.
